header: Welcome to your free trial of DataHub!
title: Get to know your Demo Environment
description: We've pre-loaded your environment with sample data and entities to help you get started. Whether you're interested in learning more about AI-powered data discovery, data lineage, data quality, or something else, we've made sure you have real-world examples to explore.

features.title: Get familiar with Search
features.description: See how DataHub makes it easy to find your data, no matter where it's stored.

features.title: View technical and business context in one place
features.description: DataHub makes it easy to find your data, no matter where it's stored.

features.title: Go deeper with Ask DataHub
features.description: Try out our new AI-powered assistant to get a deeper understanding of your metadata.
